item.description:
Join us Monday, Jan 28th, for Geeks Who Drink pub quizzes at Battery Park!

The usual pub quiz starts at 7:00pm join us and Geeks Who Drink http://geekswhodrink.com/518/ . The quiz consists of 8 rounds of 8 questions and includes a picture round, music round, and chances for FREE BEER! Last week Team "Schmoby Schmendersons" took home 1st prize! Free appetizers while they last. Come early to get a good seat and a good team. ;)

Battery Park is conveniently located in the Financial District near State Street (Orange and Blue Line), Downtown Crossing (Orange and Red Lines), and a short walk to Park Street (Red and Green Lines). Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB. You can view Battery Park's menu here: http://www.batteryparkboston.com/.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We are usually at the first booth as you walk in. Ask bartender or hostess if you cannot find us.
item.name: Pub Quiz with Geeks Who Drink at Battery Park Jan 28th
